title: Club vs Club Scrim
body:
Hi everyone! Nice to meet you all, I have just recently created a club that's open to everyone and is mainly for fun! (so send me a friend request and message if you're interested in joining). I hope to take an advantage of this new club feature as much as possible, thus I would like to suggest an idea for all clubs. I want to do a club vs club scrim, where members of one club will vs members of other clubs. Any club interested in scrimming against us please let me know - thanks :)

Keep in mind that scrims are for fun, however can also improve on your skills in the process.

replies.body: I would like to join your club but I'm a jungle main who can also go top... So if you need me then add me... I'll be adding you as a friend though.
